title: European University Interview Preparation Resources
description: A collection of structured preparation resources and tools designed to assist applicants in preparing for European university interviews, focusing on research projects, academic questions, and AI governance topics.

creators.name: Daakshayani N S
creators.affiliation: Sri Shakthi Institute of Engineering and Technology, Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, India

notes: This project provides curated interview preparation tools and question banks for European university applications and research programs.
